__inputs.description: Prometheus server that connects to Nebula
__inputs.label: Prometheus
__inputs.name: DS_PROM

description: Nebula User Dashboard. This is great to get a birds-eye and drill down view of executions in your Nebula cluster. Useful for the user.

panels.title: Successful workflow execution time by Quantile
Failed workflow execution time by Quantile

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_container_status_waiting * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !="",namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"}) by (namespace, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) > 0
targets.query: sum(kube_pod_container_status_waiting * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !="",namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"}) by (namespace, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) > 0

targets.expr: (100 * max(container_memory_rss{image!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !="",namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) / max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !=""} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name)) > 0
targets.query: (100 * max(container_memory_rss{image!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !="",namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) / max(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !=""} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name)) > 0

targets.expr: (100* sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!=""}[2m]) * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !="",namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !=""} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name)) > 0
targets.query: (100* sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{image!=""}[2m]) * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !="",namespace=~"$project-$domain",label_workflow_name=~"$workflow"} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{container!=""} * on(pod) group_left(label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name) kube_pod_labels{label_execution_id !=""} * on(pod) group_left(phase) kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running"}) by (namespace, pod, label_execution_id, label_task_name, label_node_id, label_workflow_name)) > 0

title: Nebula User Dashboard (via Prometheus)
